type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this content represents a tool return event.

tool_call_id.title: Tool Call Id
tool_call_id.description: References the ID of the ToolCallContent that initiated this tool call.

content.title: Content
content.description: The content returned by the tool execution.

is_error.title: Is Error
is_error.description: Indicates whether the tool execution resulted in an error.
